title: Whirlwind Wonderland
description: The life-altering exploits of a somewhat-normal Filipino-American girl as she meanders through sleepy suburban sprawls, empty diners, fantasy-filled commuter traffic jams, misplaced football fanaticism, ethnic identity crash courses, and just good ole family hi-jinx. New and old stories written and drawn by Rina Ayuyang, creator of Namby Pamby, a mini-comic that explores the humorous side of life's ordinary moments.
author: Rina Ayuyang
